name: A Symbol of Unification
description: Y'know, back in the day we actually used to have a flag - well, a scrap of cloth more than anything. Still, seeing it meant you knew you had allies nearby, that you were on your own home turf. So, I was thinking...
objectives: Reach the Formicai Outpost in Dam Battlegrounds
Locate the flag at the Formicai Outpost
Hoist the flag on the small platform overlooking the Red Lake
